classes.name: patient-banner
classes.description: Base class to render patient-banner

classes.name: patient-banner--dark
classes.description: Forces dark theme for sidenav

classes.name: patient-banner__container
classes.description: Container for patient-banner

classes.name: patient-banner__container--tabs
classes.description: Container for patient-banner with tabs

classes.name: patient-banner__container--stacked
classes.description: Container for patient-banner if stacked enabled

classes.name: patient-banner__container-no-icon
classes.description: Container for patient-banner with no icon

classes.name: patient-banner__container--collapsible
classes.description: Container for patient-banner if collapsible is enabled

classes.name: patient-banner__container--skinny
classes.description: Container for patient-banner skinny patient banner is enabled

classes.name: patient-banner__container--compressed
classes.description: Container for patient-banner if compressed is enabled

classes.name: patient-banner__name
classes.description: Patient banner name

classes.name: patient-banner__icon
classes.description: Patient banner icon

classes.name: patient-banner__icon--collapsible
classes.description: Icon position if collapsible is enabled

classes.name: patient-banner__icon--hidden
classes.description: Class to hide icon

classes.name: patient-banner__name
classes.description: Patient banner name

classes.name: patient-banner__select
classes.description: Overrides certain style of eds-select

classes.name: patient-banner__select--tabs
classes.description: Overrides certain style of eds-select when integrated with tabs

classes.name: patient-banner__select--hidden
classes.description: Hides dropdown

classes.name: patient-banner__tabs
classes.description: Formats patient banner with tabs accordingly

classes.name: patient-banner__value
classes.description: Formats output of patient data

classes.name: patient-banner__value--column
classes.description: Formats patient banner with columns accordingly

classes.name: patient-banner__value--bold
classes.description: Formats output of patient data

classes.name: patient-banner__value--ellipsed
classes.description: Formats patient data when there're overflowing

classes.name: patient-banner__value--mobile-ellipsed
classes.description: Formats patient data when there're overflowing on Mobile device

classes.name: patient-banner__content
classes.description: Class to align content wtih data

classes.name: patient-banner__data
classes.description: Class to space out data evenly

description: This is the Sass version of patient-banner. Following example displays patient-banner using styles only.
name: Patient Banner - Styles
usage:
The patient banner is a persistently displayed “at-a-glance” summary of basic demographic and key patient identifying information. ```html
Van DerHoote, Doris
PID
92334545745
Sex at birth
Male
Age
31y
DOB
07/22/2016
Gender identity
Male
Last Visist
07/22/2016
Referred
Dr. John Zoidberg
```
